00024 JCalc::~JCalc()
00025 {
00026     safe_delete(_listCrgUnitType);
00027     _mapCrgUnitByName.clear();
00028 
00029     map <pair<CrgUnitType *, CrgUnitType *>, JCalcData *>::iterator itm = _maplistfock.begin();
00030     for (; itm != _maplistfock.end(); itm++)
00031         delete itm->second;
00032     _maplistfock.clear();
00033 }
00034 
00035 void JCalc::Initialize(const string& filename){
00036     load_property_from_xml(_options, filename.c_str());
00037 
00038     ParseCrgUnitTypes(_options.get("segments"));
00039 }
00040 
00041 void JCalc::ParseCrgUnitTypes(Property &options){
00042     string namecoord;
00043     string nameorb;
00044     string namecrg;
00045     string nameneutr;
00046     vector <int> transorbs;
00047    
00048     string name;
00049     string molname;
00050     string namebasis;
00051     vector < vector <int> > list_atoms_monomer;
00052     vector < vector <double> > list_weights_monomer;
00053 
00054     list<Property *> types = options.Select("segment");
00055     list<Property *>::iterator iter;
00056 
00057     for (iter = types.begin();iter != types.end(); ++iter){
00058         namecoord = (*iter)->get("coordinates").as<string>();
00059 
00060         bool estatics = (*iter)->exists("qneutral");
00061         if(estatics==true){
00062             nameneutr = (*iter)->get("qneutral").as<string>();
00063             namecrg = (*iter)->get("qcharged").as<string>();
00064         }
00065         
00066         if((*iter)->exists("torbital")) transorbs = (*iter)->get("torbital").as<vector <int> >();
00067         for(int i=0; i<transorbs.size(); ++i)
00068             transorbs[i]--;
00069         
00070         if(transorbs.size() > 0) nameorb = (*iter)->get("orbitals").as<string>();
00071 
00072         name = (*iter)->get("name").as<string>();
00073         
00074         namebasis = "INDO";
00075         if((*iter)->exists("basisset") > 0) namebasis = (*iter)->get("basisset").as<string>();
00076 
00077         string all_monomer = (*iter)->get("map").as<string>();
00078         for (string::iterator c = all_monomer.begin(); c != all_monomer.end(); ++c) {
00079             if (*c == '\n') *c = ' ';
00080             if (*c == '\t') *c = ' ';
00081         }
00082         Tokenizer tok1(all_monomer, ":");
00083         Tokenizer::iterator it_mon;
00084         for (it_mon = tok1.begin(); it_mon != tok1.end(); ++it_mon) {
00085             vector <int> list_atoms;
00086             Tokenizer tok2(*it_mon, " ");
00087             tok2.ConvertToVector<int>(list_atoms);
00088             for(int i=0; i<list_atoms.size(); ++i) {
00089                 if(list_atoms[i] == 0)
00090                     throw std::runtime_error("An atom with index=0 was specified in listcharges. Counting starts at 1!");
00091 
00092                 list_atoms[i]--;
00093             }
00094             list_atoms_monomer.push_back(list_atoms);
00095         }
00096 
00097         string all_weights = (*iter)->get("weights").as<string>();
00098         for (string::iterator c = all_weights.begin(); c != all_weights.end(); ++c) {
00099             if (*c == '\n') *c = ' ';
00100             if (*c == '\t') *c = ' ';
00101         }
00102         Tokenizer tok3(all_weights, ":");
00103         for (it_mon = tok3.begin(); it_mon != tok3.end(); ++it_mon) {
00104             vector <double> list_weights;
00105             Tokenizer tok2(*it_mon, " ");
00106             tok2.ConvertToVector<double>(list_weights);
00107             list_weights_monomer.push_back(list_weights);
00108         }
00109 
00110         CrgUnitType* crgunittype = new CrgUnitType(namecoord.c_str(), nameorb.c_str(),
00111                 nameneutr.c_str(), namecrg.c_str(), namebasis,
00112                 transorbs, _listCrgUnitType.size(),
00113                 name, list_atoms_monomer, list_weights_monomer);
00114         crgunittype->setOptions(*iter);
00115         _mapCrgUnitByName.insert(make_pair(name, crgunittype));
00116         _listCrgUnitType.push_back(crgunittype);
00117 
00118         clearListList(list_atoms_monomer);
00119         clearListList(list_weights_monomer);
00120     }
00121 }

00123 
00124 JCalc::JCalcData * JCalc::InitJCalcData(CrgUnitType * mol1, CrgUnitType *mol2)
00125 {
00126     JCalcData * data = new JCalcData;
00127 
00128     data->_type1 = mol1;
00129     data->_type2 = mol2;
00130 
00131     data->_orblabels.first = data->_type1 -> GetTransOrbs();
00132     data->_orblabels.second = data->_type2 -> GetTransOrbs();
00133 
00134     int nrorbs1 = data->_orblabels.first.size();
00135     int nrorbs2 = data->_orblabels.second.size();
00136     /*for (int i = 0; i < nrorbs; i++) {
00137         if (data->_orblabels.first[i] != i && data->_orblabels.second[i] != i) {
00138             cout << "orblabels: " << data->_orblabels.first[i] << " " << data->_orblabels.second[i] << endl;
00139             throw "Error in RateCalculator, the charge unit types do not have stripped orbitals";
00140         }
00141     }*/
00142     //initialise the first copy of the molecules + orbitals
00143     data->_mol1.define_bs(mol1->GetBS());
00144     data->_mol1.cp_atompos(mol1->GetCrgUnit());
00145     data->_mol1.cp_atoms(mol1->GetCrgUnit());
00146     data->_orb1.init_orbitals_stripped(mol1->GetOrb(), nrorbs1);
00147     data->_mol1.assign_orb(&data->_orb1);
00148     data->_mol1.cp_crg(mol1->GetCrgUnit());
00149 
00150     //inititalise the second copy of molecules + orbitals
00151     data->_mol2.define_bs(mol2->GetBS());
00152     data->_mol2.cp_atompos(mol2->GetCrgUnit());
00153     data->_mol2.cp_atoms(mol2->GetCrgUnit());
00154     data->_orb2.init_orbitals_stripped(mol2->GetOrb(), nrorbs2);
00155     data->_mol2.assign_orb(&data->_orb2);
00156     data->_mol2.cp_crg(mol2->GetCrgUnit());
00157 
00158     // we have stripped the orbs to the bone
00159     for (int i = 0; i < data->_orblabels.first.size(); i++) {
00160         data->_orblabels.first[i] = i;
00161     }
00162     for (int i =0;i < data->_orblabels.second.size(); i++) {
00163         data->_orblabels.second[i] = i;
00164     }
00165 
00166     //initialise the fock matrix
00167     data->_fock.init(data->_mol1, data->_mol2);
00168 
00169     // add a quick reference to find calculator for a pair
00170     _maplistfock.insert(make_pair(make_pair(mol1, mol2), data));
00171 
00172     return data;
00173 }
00174 
00175 JCalc::JCalcData * JCalc::getJCalcData(CrgUnit & one, CrgUnit & two)
00176 {
00177     JCalcData * jdata;
00178     map <pair<CrgUnitType *, CrgUnitType *>, JCalcData *>::iterator itm =
00179             _maplistfock.find(make_pair(one.getType(), two.getType()));
00180     if (itm == _maplistfock.end()) {
00181         jdata = InitJCalcData(one.getType(), two.getType());
00182     }
00183     else {
00184         jdata = itm->second;
00185     }
00186     return jdata;
00187 }
00188 
00189 vector <double> JCalc::CalcJ(CrgUnit & one, CrgUnit & two)
00190 {
00191     if(one.getType()->_transorbs.size() == 0)
00192         throw std::runtime_error("no orbital information found for conjugated segment " + one.getName());
00193     if(two.getType()->_transorbs.size() == 0)
00194         throw std::runtime_error("no orbital information found for conjugated segment " + two.getName());
00195 
00196     if (one.getType()->getId() > two.getType()->getId())
00197         return CalcJ(two, one);
00198     
00199     JCalcData * jdata = getJCalcData(one, two);
00200 
00201     //calculate J
00202     one.rot_two_mol(two, jdata->_mol1, jdata->_mol2);
00203 
00204     // calculating orbitals for all pairs
00205 
00206       if (tools::globals::verbose) {
00207            cout << "  id1:id2 [J] " << endl;
00208            cout << one.getType()->getId() << ":" 
00209                 << two.getType()->getId() << " [";
00210        }    
00211     
00212     vector < double > Js; // vector with all Js
00213     vector < pair <int, int> > _pois; // vector with all pairs of interest
00214     pair <int, int> poi; // pair of interest
00215     for (int i = 0; i < jdata->_orblabels.first.size(); i++) {
00216         for (int j = 0; j < jdata->_orblabels.first.size(); j++) {
00217             poi.first = jdata->_orblabels.first[i];
00218             poi.second = jdata->_orblabels.second[j];
00219             Js.push_back(jdata->_fock.calcJ(poi));
00220             _pois.push_back(poi);
00221             if (tools::globals::verbose) { cout << jdata->_fock.calcJ(poi) << " " ; }
00222         }
00223         if (tools::globals::verbose) { cout << "]" << endl; }
00224     }
00225     
00226     
00227      
00228     
00229     int my = one.getType()->getId();
00230     cout << my << endl;
00231     
00232     return Js;
00233 }
00234 
00235 int JCalc::WriteProJ(CrgUnit & one, CrgUnit & two,string namedir)
00236 {
00237     // only write them when one.id < two.id
00238     if (one.getType()->getId() < two.getType()->getId())
00239         return 1;
00240 
00241     //rotate the molecule and orbitals
00242     JCalcData * jdata = getJCalcData(one, two);
00243     one.rot_two_mol(two, jdata->_mol1, jdata->_mol2);
00244 
00245 
00246     ofstream out;
00247     string name1, nameorb1, name2, nameorb2, namedim;
00248     name1 =namedir + boost::lexical_cast<string>(one.getId()) + ".xyz";
00249     name2 = namedir +boost::lexical_cast<string>(two.getId()) + ".xyz";
00250     nameorb1 =namedir + boost::lexical_cast<string>(one.getId()) + ".fort.7";
00251     nameorb2 = namedir +boost::lexical_cast<string>(two.getId()) + ".fort.7";
00252     namedim = namedir +boost::lexical_cast<string>(one.getId())+"and"+
00253             boost::lexical_cast<string>(two.getId()) +".com";
00254 
00255     
00256     //write the info for molecule1
00257     out.open(name1.c_str());
00258     (jdata->_mol1).print(out);
00259     out.close();
00260 
00261     (jdata->_orb1).print_g03(nameorb1);
00262     //write the info for molecule2
00263     out.open(name2.c_str());
00264     (jdata->_mol2).print(out);
00265     out.close();
00266 
00267     (jdata->_orb2).print_g03(nameorb2);
00268     
00269     //write the input file for both
00270     orb dimerorb;
00271     dimerorb.dimerise_orbs((jdata->_orb1), (jdata->_orb2), (jdata->_mol1).n_el,(jdata->_mol2).n_el);
00272 
00273     out.open(namedim.c_str());
00274     // write header
00275     out << "%nproc=1" <<'\n' <<
00276            "%mem=1Gb" << '\n'<<
00277            "#p b3lyp/TZVP-6D guess(cards) scf(MaxCycle=1) "<<
00278             "Nosymm IOp(3/33=1) IOp(5/13=1) punch=mo" << '\n' <<
00279             '\n' <<
00280             "autogen" << '\n' << '\n'<<
00281             "0 1" <<'\n';
00282     (jdata->_mol1).print(out);
00283     (jdata->_mol2).print(out);
00284     //write blank line
00285     out << '\n';
00286     out.close();
00287     dimerorb.print_g03(namedim, string ("a"));
00288     return 0;
00289 }
00290 
00291 CrgUnitType * JCalc::GetCrgUnitTypeByName(string name)
00292 {
00293     map <string, CrgUnitType *>::iterator ittype = this->_mapCrgUnitByName.find(name);
00294     if (ittype == _mapCrgUnitByName.end()) {
00295         throw runtime_error("Cannot find segment type with name: " + name);
00296     }
00297     CrgUnitType *type = ittype->second;
00298     return type;
00299 }
